ygData.subject: RE: Jaxan's Jig
ygData.msgSnippet: It could very well be that J.M. is correct in that the Jig is not *designed* to have any effect on mana regen yet there is some side effect in the code that is
ygData.messageBody:
It could very well be that J.M. is correct in that the Jig is not
*designed* to have any effect on mana regen yet there is some side effect in
the code that is not known that actually affects it. A difference of a half
of a minute does seem a bit large due to server refresh rates.
And in the end does it really matter? If your party members *think* that it
does even if it might not and you're just standing around anyway, why not
appeal to them and play it? I guess if it comes down to a choice in songs
one may be torn but if there's an extra song slot...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)

8)
8)Well J.M. Capozzi laid it to rest a while back. Jig actually
8)has no effect
8)on mana.
8)
8)Course, if you can indeed disprove him then I'd be thinking
8)J.M. Capozzi
8)wasn't really with Verant afterall. I mean I can't confirm
8)whether or not
8)J.M. is legit. Is this just someone who just joined the
8)list, and knew a
8)heck of a lot about the game and faked it?
8)
8)Actually, I doubt that J.M. is a "fake" but wish you consider it, for
8)arguments sake. I have no idea who J.M. is, and have no
8)resource to confirm
8)it for that matter. Must say, if J.M. were a fake, he or she
8)would be a
8)very good fake. But who are we, as the grunts, to know who
8)makes the game
8)anyway?
8)
8)Roop
